body.name: Amarose Rose Water Facial Toner with Hyaluronic Acid - Revitalize and Hydrate Skin with This Refreshing Facial Toner - Experience The Calming Elegance of Rosewater - Ideal for All Skin Types
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 14 mins
features: 🌹 SOOTHING ROSE WATER TONER: Elevate your skincare routine with the luxurious Amarose Rose Water Toner. Immerse yourself in the soothing essence of rose water, renowned for its calming properties. Experience a spa-like pampering session every day, as this exquisite toner envelopes your skin in a gentle, refreshing embrace.

🌿 HYDRATING FORMULA: Unleash the power of nature's hydration with our Rose Water Toner Spray for Face. Infused with the essence of roses, this toner seeps into your skin, quenching its thirst and leaving it revitalized. Say goodbye to dull, lackluster skin as the nourishing mist envelops you in a delicate veil of moisture.

🌼 TAILORED TO ALL SKIN TYPES: Embrace the versatility of our rosewater facial toner that caters to every skin type. Whether you battle excess oil, dryness, or sensitivity, this toner has you covered. Feel the harmonious blend of rose extracts and natural ingredients working together to restore your skin's vitality, no matter your unique needs.

🌷 GENTLE NOURISHMENT: Embrace the tender care of our Face Toner, meticulously crafted to pamper your skin. The delicate touch of rose water infuses your skin with nutrients, revitalizing it from within. Indulge in the sensation of soft, supple skin as our toner becomes an integral part of your self-care ritual.

🌸 TIMELESS ELEGANCE: Unlock the timeless secret of Rose Water Toner Spray. Allow its refreshing mist to envelop you, revealing your skin's natural radiance. Whether you're prepping for the day ahead or winding down at night, experience the elegance of roses and the revitalizing touch they bring to your skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Glycerin Glycerin's natural humectant and moisture-attracting properties make it effective for addressing skin dryness. Our Vegetable Glycerin can enhance your skincare routine as a foundational ingredient or added to toners and moisturizers. Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, a skincare toner staple, provides soothing hydration. Its natural properties calm and revitalize your skin, leaving it refreshed and rejuvenated. Perfect for achieving a radiant complexion. Hamamelis Virginiana Hamamelis Virginiana, known as Witch Hazel, is a star ingredient in our skincare toner. It tightens pores, balances oil production, and soothes irritation, promoting clear and radiant skin. Experience its natural astringent and calming benefits. Chondrus Crispus Extract Chondrus Crispus Extract, derived from nutrient-rich red algae, is a key ingredient in our skincare toner. This extract hydrates, nourishes, and supports skin's natural elasticity, leaving it supple and revitalized. Achieve a healthy, radiant complexion with this marine-derived powerhouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best rose water out!!!
reviews.reviewText: I typically use this for my face and it wakes me up and moisturizes my face everyday after I wash it . Really helps my skin I have been glowing after every use.

reviews.reviewerName: Very simple and nice l like it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good toner - strong smell
reviews.reviewText: I don't really love products with much scent, and this one smells very strongly of roses. I struggled between a 3 and 4 star rating because the scent is that strong to me. However, it is REALLY nice and refreshing and does an excellent job as a toner so I'm going with 4 stars. The addition of HA to rose water is great, and I have noticed an improvement in hydration which has been nice since winter just started here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The toner is light and refreshing. toners are often too strong but I really like the consistency and feel this one. Has a very nice fragrance to that is not overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells and feels lovely
reviews.reviewText: It’s rose scent is a bit stronger than I’d normally love, but it’s really a pleasant scent. It makes my skin look glowy and feels amazing. I look forward to using it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a refreshing mist and I like the way it feels on my skin. The rose scent is very strong. Given that it’s a rose water, it makes sense, but I would prefer that it be slightly less perfumed. I will continue to use it, but probably will not order it again. If you love the smell of roses, you will likely love this product. In that case, it would probably also be nice as a pillow mist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine Mist and Nice Box
reviews.reviewText: The Amarose rose water is a nice toning mist that smells fantastic and comes in a cute little box. The packaging makes it great for gifting or keeping for yourself as the bottle stands nicely in the little display. You get a rather large bottle and the spray is nice and fine. It smells nicely of roses but is not too overpowering. The mist is lightweight and you can easily use this any time of the day as a base or just as a pick me up. I personally thought my skin looked hydrated after use. In summary this is a great looking toner that smells nice and feels good on dry or even oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amarose Rose Water Facial Toner
reviews.reviewText: This Amarose Rose Water Facial Toner feels so nice and refreshing when I spray it on my skin. It's hydrating, lightweight, and it smells good. It also has hylauronic acid in it. Hylauronic acid is a really good skincare ingredient that I always look for in skincare products.
